message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $2,000,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it holds for both of us.  Let me know your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $1,200,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to come down to $1,750,000, recognizing the value you place on the product.  This offer reflects a significant compromise on my end, and I hope you'll consider it.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,600,000 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
